thread.section_title: Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Crazy Chic
thread.title_full: Crazy Chic - Review of Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alison C
title: Crazy Chic
text:
From the first time we saw this amazing maison particulaire, we just HAD to stay here! Such a grand entrance, so noble and regal and stunning!
However, the decor on the inside leaves the classical and delves into the very whimsical, I felt as if I was in Alice in Wonderland! The rooms are wildly decorated, with stripes and patterns and mirrors on the window ledges which can be confusing!
I was VERY disappointed that the linen wasn't to par and that there was only a motel like blanket, not a duvet.
The bar has a very rich ambiance, it's easy to sink into a leather chair, sip a cocktail or glass of wine.
The staff is accommodating, yet not totally exceptional with regards to warmth, the concierge needs to adopt a more embracing attitude; we like to be pampered and not feel like we are intruding....The spa was lovely, albeit dark. I had a wonderful facial.
Would we go back? I'm not sure with all the choices in Paris....
Room Tip: 501 was well situated See more room tips
